The youth programme is suitable for young adults aged 17 and 25 but all registered pilgrims are welcome., 108=The concluding liturgy, Statio Orbis, on Sunday 17th June 2012 takes place in Croke Park.}
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {10959=Mobile Phone Version of this website | Email: info@iec2012.ie | Site by Strata3, 752=The information below is an outline of the youth programme of events on Saturday 16th June and is subject to change. Programme information will be updated when details for some speakers and themes are finalised.}
textBeforeTable: The concluding liturgy, Statio Orbis, on Sunday 17th June 2012 takes place in Croke Park. Come and participate in the youth programme of interactive catechesis, workshops, drama and music. There will be a dedicated youth space with a youth programme of events in the Royal Dublin Society from Monday 11th June until Saturday 16th June. The youth programme is suitable for young adults aged 17 and 25 but all registered pilgrims are welcome. During the Congress week (10th-17th June 2012), many people will gather in the Royal Dublin Society (RDS) where the Congress week programme will take place.
